content: Fungiman is armed with a giant staff and plenty of poisonous spores to surround you with. In addition to blunt attacks with the staff, make sure not to step on any of the poison gas on the floor. Making contact with the gas will start to poison you and eat away at your health. When casting Immobilize, wait until the ground is clear of poison so you can really lay it on him without worrying about getting poisoned at the same time.
promot:
This excerpt is taken from the file "Fungiman_Spirit.md", within the section "Fungiman Spirit" and the sub-section "Fungiman Fight". The content is presented below:

Fungiman is armed with a giant staff and plenty of poisonous spores to surround you with. In addition to blunt attacks with the staff, make sure not to step on any of the poison gas on the floor. Making contact with the gas will start to poison you and eat away at your health. When casting Immobilize, wait until the ground is clear of poison so you can really lay it on him without worrying about getting poisoned at the same time.
